i, value, pos, parent

  read(*,*) N
  allocate(arr(N)) read(*,*) arr

  heapSize =0
  allocate(heap(N)) sum_result =0

  do i=1, N
    value = arr(i)

    ! insert into the heap
    heapSize = heapSize+1
    heap(heapSize) = value
    pos = heapSize
    do while( pos>1 )
      parent = (pos-1)/2
      if( heap(pos) < heap(parent) ) then
        ! swap
        call swap(heap(pos), heap(parent))
        pos = parent
      else
        exit
      endif
    end do

    ! Now check if value (arr(i)) is less than or equal to heap's min (heap(1)) if( value <= heap(1) ) then
      sum_result = sum_result +1
    end if
  end do

  print*, sum_result

contains

subroutine swap(a, b) integer, intent(inout) :: a, b
  integer :: temp
  temp = a
  a = b
  b = temp
end subroutine swap

end program atcoder_ABC152_C

module MinHeap_mod
    type MinHeap
        integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: H
        integer :: size =0
    end type MinHeap

    contains

    ! Function to create new min heap
    function new_minheap(initial_capacity) result(h)
        integer, intent(in) :: initial_capacity
        type(MinHeap) :: h

        allocate(h%H(initial_capacity))
        h%size =0
    end function

    ! Insert function
    subroutine insert(h, value)
        class(MinHeap), intent(inout) :: h
        integer, intent(in) :: value
        integer :: pos 

        h%size = h%size +1

        if (h%size > size(h%H)) then
            ! Need to resize array
            call resize(h)
        end if

        h%H(h%size) = value
        pos = h%size
        do while ( pos >1 .and. h%H(pos) < h%H((pos-1)/2) )
            call swap(h%H(pos), h%H((pos-1)/2))
            pos = (pos-1)/2
        end do
    end subroutine

    ! private function to swap two elements
    subroutine swap(a, b)
        integer, intent(inout) :: a, b
        integer :: temp
        temp = a
        a = b
        b = temp
    end subroutine

    ! Resize the heap array when needed
    subroutine resize(h)
        class(MinHeap) :: h
        integer :: newCapacity, oldSize

        oldSize = size(h%H)
        newCapacity = oldSize *2
        ! Allocate new array
        integer, allocatable :: temp(:)
        allocate(temp(oldSize))
        temp = h%H
        deallocate(h%H)
        allocate(h%H(newCapacity))
        h%H(1:oldSize) = temp
    end subroutine 

    ! Get the minimum value function
    function peek(h) result(m)
        class(MinHeap), intent(inout) :: h
        integer :: m

        m = h%H(1)
    end function
end module

program atcoder_ABC152_C

  implicit none

  integer :: N, sum_result
  integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: arr

  integer, allocatable :: heap(:)
  integer :: heapSize
  integer :: i, value, pos, parent

  read(*,*) N
  allocate(arr(N))
  read(*,*) arr

  heapSize =0
  allocate(heap(N)) 

  sum_result =0

  do i=1, N
    value = arr(i)

    ! insert into the heap
    heapSize = heapSize+1
    heap(heapSize) = value
    pos = heapSize
    do while( pos>1 )
      parent = (pos-1)/2
      if( heap(pos) < heap(parent) ) then
        ! swap
        call swap(heap(pos), heap(parent))
        pos = parent
      else
        exit
      endif
    end do

    ! Now check if value (arr(i)) is less than or equal to heap's min (heap(1))
    if( value <= heap(1) ) then
      sum_result = sum_result +1
    end if
  end do

  print*, sum_result

contains

subroutine swap(a, b)
  integer, intent(inout) :: a, b
  integer :: temp
  temp = a
  a = b
  b = temp
end subroutine swap

end program atcoder_ABC152_C
